japanese: あー……疲れた……。
translation: Ahh... I'm so tired...

japanese:
私もさすがに疲れちゃった。
やっと一息つけるね。
translation:
I know how you feel.
Finally, we can take a breather.

japanese: そうだな……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese:
お疲れ様、お兄ちゃん。
一花さんもお疲れ様。
translation:
You did good, big bro.
And you too, Ichika-san.

japanese: ありがと、らいはちゃん。
translation: Thanks, Raiha-chan.

japanese: うーん……。
translation: Hmmm...

japanese:
ん？　どうしたの？
私の顔、変？
translation:
Hm? What's wrong?
Do I have a weird look or something?

japanese: ううん、じゃなくて。
translation: No, it's not that.

japanese:
なんだか、まだ信じられない。
お兄ちゃんが、あの中野　一花さんの
旦那さんだなんて。
translation:
It's just that I still can't believe it.
That my big bro is the husband
of Nakano Ichika-san.

japanese:
正直、俺もそう思う。
いまや知らん奴はいないくらいの有名人だもんな。
translation:
To be honest, I feel the same way.
She's so famous that everyone knows who she is.

japanese: あはは、ありがとうございます。
translation: Ahaha, thanks very much.

japanese:
だが、よく考えてみれば実際のお前は
怠惰でだらしないわけだし――
translation:
However, when I think about it, you're 
actually very lazy and sloppy%p-2;――

japanese: ちょっと！
translation: Hey!

japanese: むぐっ！？
translation: MGGH?!

japanese:
風太郎！
らいはちゃんの中の私のイメージ、崩さないで！
translation:
Futaro!
Don't ruin the image of me that Raiha-chan
has in her mind!

japanese: なんでだよ。
translation: Why not?

japanese:
らいはちゃんには、私は素敵なお姉さんだって
思っていてもらいたいの！
translation:
I want Raiha-chan to think of me
as a cool big sister!

japanese:
なに言ってんだ。
取り繕っても、どうせすぐ崩れる。
これからは家族なんだぞ？
translation:
What are you saying?
I don't think you can keep that up for long,
even if you try.

japanese:
それはそうだけどさー。
できるだけ守っていきたいじゃん。
translation: Well I want to try my best to protect that image!

japanese:
もしかしたら、奇跡的に
隠し通せる可能性もなくはないでしょ？
translation: Maybe there's a slim chance we can keep it a secret?

japanese:
ふっ！
だったら根本的な生活態度の改善を考えるべきだな。
translation:
Pph!
Then you should work on improving
your fundamental lifestyle habits.

japanese:
う……。
耳が痛い……。
translation:
Ooh...
That hurts...

japanese: ふふっ！
translation: Teehee!

japanese: どうした？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
普段の一花さんはかっこいいけど、
お兄ちゃんの前だと可愛いんだなって思って。
translation:
You're normally so cool, Ichika-san,
but you're so cute in front of my big bro.

japanese:
か、可愛い……かな？
そうかな？
translation:
C-cute...huh?
Is that so?

japanese:
うん、いまね、すごく可愛い顔してた。
テレビでは見たことない一花さんだったよ。
translation:
Yeah, you were making a really cute face just now.
I've never seen that side of you on TV.

japanese: そ、そんな風に言われちゃうと照れるなぁ。
translation: Th-that's gonna make me blush.

japanese:
お兄ちゃんは、あんなにかっこいい一花さんを
可愛くしちゃえるんだ。
さすがは旦那さん。
translation:
Big bro can even make the cool Ichika-san act cute.
What a good husband.

japanese: ……まあな。
translation: ...Well, I guess.

japanese:
ふふっ！
それじゃ私、スーツ返してくるね。
translation:
Teehee!
Well then, I'll go return your suit.

japanese: おう、サンキュー。
translation: Okay, thanks.

japanese:
あはは……。
らいはちゃんもすっかり大人になっちゃったなぁ。
translation:
Ahaha...
Raiha-chan has grown up so much, hasn't she?

japanese:
もう高校生だからな。
手に負えなくなっちまったぜ。
translation:
Yeah, she's in high school now.
She's becoming quite a handful.

japanese:
えー？
風太郎が勝てないのは昔からでしょ。
translation:
Huh?
You've never been able to stand up to her.

japanese: 確かに。
translation: That is true.

japanese:
それにしても、らいはちゃんが高校生か。
あっという間だったね。
translation:
But really, Raiha-chan's in high school now.
Time really flies.

japanese:
５年か。
これで一区切りだな。
translation:
Yeah. It's been five years.
We've come a long way.

japanese: そうだね、結婚式を挙げたんだから。
translation: Yeah. We got married.

japanese:
感慨深いもんがあるな……。
本当に、無事に終わってよかった。
translation:
There's something very moving about it...
I'm really glad it ended with no issue.

japanese:
私、風太郎が緊張のしすぎで
誓いのキスを失敗するんじゃないかって
ヒヤヒヤしたよ。
translation:
I was worried that you'd be so nervous
and would mess up the ceremonial kiss.

japanese: いや、それは……お前だって緊張してただろ？
translation: Well, I mean...you were nervous too, right?

japanese:
風太郎ほどじゃないもーん。
仕事柄、人前に立つのは慣れてるし。
translation:
Not as much as you, Futaro.
I'm used to being in front of people
because of my job.

japanese: そりゃそうか。
translation: That makes sense.

japanese: 風太郎だって、初めてじゃなかったでしょ？
translation:
But it wasn't your first time either, right,
Futaro?

japanese: いま、いつのこと思い出してた？
translation: What were you remembering just now?

japanese: ……５年前、学園祭の帰り道。
translation:
...Five years ago,
on the way back from the school festival.

japanese: 私も一緒。
translation: Me too.

japanese:
そういえばさ、
あの時の答えをまだ聞いてなかったよね。
translation:
Come to think of it,
I never heard the answer from you back then.

japanese:
答えって。
飲み物買ってこいって、あれか？
translation:
The answer?
You mean when you asked me to buy a drink?

japanese: ああ、あれは君がなにも買わなくて――
translation: Yeah, and you didn't buy anything%p-2;――

japanese:
買わない、じゃないか。
なにも買えなくて、結局、最終日まで
考えさせてくれってことだったでしょ？
translation:
You couldn't buy anything,
so you made me think about it
until the last day, right?

japanese:
そっちじゃなくてさ。
もう１つ、あの公園で聞いたよね？
translation:
But, not that.
The other thing you asked me at that park, remember?

japanese: 嬉しかった？
translation: Did it make you happy?

japanese:
（もう５年も前のことなのに、
　いまでも鮮明に思い出せる）
translation:
(Even though it was five years ago,
 I can still remember it vividly.)

japanese:
（学園祭の帰り道の公園でした、あのキスの感触。
　その時に感じた気持ちも――）
translation:
(The sensation of that kiss in the park
 on the way back from the school festival.
 The feelings I had at that time%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: ねえ、どうだった？
translation: Hey, how did you feel?

japanese:
まあ……その、なんだ。
なんというか……。
translation:
Well... Umm, you know.
It's just, like...

japanese:
ふーん、そっか。
嬉しかったんだね。
translation:
Oh, I see.
You were happy, right?

japanese: ま、まだ答えてないだろ。
translation: W-well, you haven't answered yet.

japanese:
何年一緒にいると思ってるの？
言わなくても顔と態度でわかるよ。
translation:
How many years do you think we've been together?
Even if you don't say it,
I can tell from your face and attitude.

japanese:
ふふっ！
風太郎はからかいがいのある旦那さんだなー。
translation:
Heheh!
You're a husband worth teasing.

japanese:
あんまりからかうと、
お前の怠惰さをらいはに全部バラすぞ。
translation:
If you tease me too much,
I'll spill the beans about your laziness to Raiha.

japanese:
ええっ！？
それはやめて！
私のかっこいいお姉さん像が崩れちゃう！
translation:
What?!
Not that!
My cool big sister image will be ruined!

japanese:
冗談だ。
どうせ、それは放っておいても崩れるしな。
translation:
Just kidding.
Either way, even if we pretend it's not true, 
it's all going to fall apart eventually.

japanese: （あの時の答え、言わなくてもバレたが……）
translation:
(She probably already knew the answer,
 from back then...)

japanese:
なあ、一花。
あの時のキスの話だが。
translation:
Hey, Ichika.
About that kiss we had back then.

japanese: なに？
translation: What about it?

japanese: ……嬉しかった。
translation: ...I was really happy.

japanese: うん、知ってる。
translation: Yeah, I know.

japanese: あの時の気持ちに従ったから、今日がある。
translation:
I followed my feelings from back then
and that's why we're here today.

japanese:
そして、今日のキスでその先の気持ちも
知ることができた。
translation:
And through today's kiss, I was able to
understand your feelings from before.

japanese: その先？
translation: From before?

japanese: 幸せって気持ちだ。
translation: The feeling of happiness.

japanese:
一花と並んで歩んでいく人生が、
このキスから始まるんだと思ったら――
translation:
I thought that walking through life with you, Ichika,
would start with this kiss.

japanese:
あの時感じた嬉しいって気持ちを越えて、
幸せな気持ちになったんだ。
translation: Beyond the happiness I felt at that moment, I felt pure bliss.

japanese:
うん。
私もいま、とても幸せ。
translation:
Yes.
I'm very happy right now, too.

japanese:
それに、これからもずっと幸せだよ。
風太郎と一緒なら、いつまでも――
translation:
And, we'll be happy together forever.
As long as I'm with you, Futaro%p-2;――
